sentences.sentence: There is nobody here. We needn't have been in such a burry.
sentences.translation: 一个人都没来呢，我们本不必这么着急。

sentences.sentence: I am a volcano quiet in many years I wish one day the magma burry in my mind will spout to the sky!
sentences.translation: 我是一座沉寂了多年的火山，希望有一天积压在我心中的滚滚岩浆能直冲云霄！

sentences.sentence: The socially awkward Mr Burry, a one-eyed fund manager with Asperger's syndrome, avoided contact with people if he could help it.
sentences.translation: 患有阿斯·伯格综合征的独眼巴里先生其貌不扬，因而非到逼不得已不会与人交往。
